summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 4883 for the improvement of 6th Avenue Southwest, from West Spokane Street to a point approximately 830 feet south of the south margin of West Spokane Street; by constructing watermains and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 56033, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
